1.「おおっ。派手に やってやがんな。: Oh, take a look at this!

3.「なぁに ムスっとしてんだ ラスタ。| ほら。こいつが <pc>。| さっき話し: What are you pouting about, Rasta?|This is <pc>. The legendary talent I|was talking about earlier!

4.「紹介するぜ <pc>。| こいつは ラスターシャ！| うち一番の カリスマ踊り: Let me introduce you, <pc>.|This is Rasta, our most charismatic dancer!

5.「まるで 私以外にも 踊り子を | 抱えているかのような クチぶりね。: You're talking as if there are other|dancers in the room.

6.「グワッハハハ！ 少数精鋭は オレの信条！| 共に 伝説を築くに ふさわしい|: Gwahahaha! I believe in the elite few!|I only call on those who are worthy of|building a legend with.

7.「そんなことより ラスタ。| ……どうだ？ こいつなら いけるだろ？| 例の儀式: It's not about that though, Rasta. Do you|think <pc> will be able to pull off|the ritual?

9.「いやあ。ビックリしたぜ。| はじめて ラスタに会った時以来の| 衝撃だったな。: I'm surprised. I haven't been this shocked|since the first time I met Rasta. My hips|after all...

11.「そうそう！ 骨盤が てんでダメ……！ | まさに 廃盤……: Oh yeah! My hips are a total mess. They've|seen better days.

12.「って……ええええっ！ ダメ？| 骨盤……ダメ？: It's like... yeah! No? Hips... no?

13.「まさか……通過儀礼を こなしたくらいで| 本気で 私の合方がつとまると 思って:
Did you really think that completing the|rite of passage would be enough to get|this job?|
|You're very naive if you thought otherwise.

16.「じつは ラスタは今 合方……| 一緒に踊る パートナーを探しててよ。| ちいっ: The truth is, Rasta is looking for a partner|to dance with. She's just a little bit on|edge.

17.「勝手に 志願してくる奴ぁ 多いが | ろくな奴が いなくてよ。プロデューサーと: We've had many people volunteer, but no one|has made the cut. As her manager,|I've struggled to find someone.

18.「そこに現れた逸材が お前ってわけよ。 | 今回は ちぃっと 時期が早すぎたが…: In time, I'm sure she'll recognize you.|It's just a little too early right now.

19.「他の奴にゃ クチも聞かなかったんだから| それに比べりゃあ 上出来よ。| ちょ: Although you stand out from the other|volunteers, you do look a little ridiculous.

20.「まあ 優れた合方と ユニットを組むのは| <pc>伝説 誕生への 近道だからよ:
Forming a group with a legendary partner|is a shortcut to becoming a|legend yourself, . For now, trust me|
|and work on your art.

21.「おっと！ まずは 転職しねぇと| 始まらねぇよな。グワッハハハ！: Whoa! You'll need to change vocations|first to get started though. Gwahahaha!

22.「なんと！ オレがバッチリ ダーマ神殿に| 根回しして もうすでに 転職できるよ: So! I've already made arrangements with|the Alltrades Abbey so that you can change|vocations. So I'm your manager now, right?

23.「なあに。礼には およばねぇよ。| 踊り子プロデューサー ひと筋２０年。| これ: What? You don't have to thank me. I've|been a dance manager for 20 years. And|all of this before breakfast, too!

24.「そう思って じつは さっき | ダーマ神殿まで 根回ししに| 行ってきたんだが: That's why I went to Alltrades Abbey earlier|to lay the groundwork...

25.「なんと お前 すでに| 踊り子に 転職できるらしいじゃねぇか！| やっぱ 逸材: I'm sure you'll be able to get a new|job as a Dancer! After all, the best ones are|different from the rest.

26.「せめて 何かしてやれないかと 思ってな。 | <pc>伝説の 幕開けを祝して|: This is the least I could do for you,|<pc>. Here's a gift to celebrate the start|of a legend.

27.「つーわけで 歌って踊って 実力つけて | さっさと ラスタに 認められてくんな: So sing, dance and get good at what you do|and Rasta will surely recognize you!|I'm looking forward to the birth of our group.

28.「そうだな……レベル３０以上の| 踊り子になれば さすがのラスタも| 認めてくれ: I'm sure that if you became a level 30|Dancer, even Rasta would accept you.

29.「そしたら また オレんとこに来てくれよ。| ラスタにバシっと 成長を見せつけて: And then you can come back to see me.|Let's show Rasta how much you have grown!

30.「あ！ 言い忘れてたが このテント……| 勝手に入ると ラスタが怒るんだ。| そ: Oh! I forgot to tell you. If you enter|this tent without permission, Rasta will be|very upset. I'll be back. See you later!

31.「そんな人と組んでも 足手まといなだけよ。| 悪いけど 遊びじゃないの。| あな: I'm sorry, but this is not a game. I can't|compromise with someone at your level.

32.「……しかし ちいっと前までは| 営業に行くのも 面倒がるような| ものぐさ踊り:
You'll be happy to know she's not|the only one who's a bit of a jerk. Not too|long ago, I myself was a dancer who couldn't|
|be bothered to work.

33.「最近 人が変わったように 意識高くなってよ。| 踊りが達者なのは もとからなん: I've certainly changed though. It's|strange, but I've always been a good dancer.|Gwahahaha!
